42308.summary: Customers in the Spence and Daniel McIntyre areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42308.title: Sept 26 – Winnipeg (Spence, Daniel McIntyre) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Hydro continues to work to restore power. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
